pitch.cc: Dan Haren may prefer to go after Jarrod Saltalamacchia, whose OPS is .500 this season, with the cutter rather than facing Jacoby Ellsbury, whose OPS is .787.
Dan Haren didn't stick to the scouting report; Jarrod Saltalamacchia is hitting .500 this season against four-seam fastballs in that location.
